doc.field: - American Barrick Resources Corp said it sold two coal supply agreements and substantially all assets at its two coal mines in Ohio to [Peabody Coal Co] of Henderson, Kentucky, for an undisclosed price. The company said proceeds from this sale, together with the sale of the remaining coal assets, should allow it to fully recover its investment in the operations. It said the transactions will complete its previously announced plan to sell all non-gold assets.
